page.title: 09ATTITUDES IN N.FERRIBY.
page.content: North Ferriby faces the following general problems.There are too many cars going too fast around the village,people do not like it.When children come home they buy sweets and drop their paper in the village making it untidy.On Monday and Thursday night the fish and chip shop is open and this results in a lot of extra litter. Some people feel that the bus service is inadequate especially for the retired people without a car.Also some residents complain that their roads are in need of repair and are inadequately lit. North Ferriby should be a quiet village but because of motor cycles the village can be quite noisy. The village has lots of dogs and horses so some roads and paths can be badly fouled.
